K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-024:133b-0: @133b 'phags pa yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-024:133b-1: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo; ;na mo bha ga wa te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-024:133b-3: dha re dha ra na ti ye sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-024:133b-4: ma bsgrubs kyang bklags pas 'grub ste gi wang la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te dpral bar thig le byas na kun gyi yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-024:133b-5: ti tsha la sngags te mig la bskus na gar bltas pa mig sprad mthun no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-024:133b-6: chu la sngags te 'thungs na gzhan rnams zas ster snying 'dod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-024:133b-7: yid du 'ong ba'i gzungs rdzogs so ////
